name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use Clip
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use Clip.exe in Scripts
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*\(Clipboard|i*)`
